overview: Visual opacities and blurs, the side effects of the eponymous eyedrops are what inspired Dietmar Brehm to HYLO-VISION-PLUS. Version 1. A dynamic cloudy sky at the start and end, in between: faces, gazes, bodies in movement. An intoxicating and energizing night of flickering contrasts, sensory stimuli, and chimeras that grants only a few moments of pause.
title: HYLO-VISION-PLUS. Version 1
